Pack Runner Assault.name: Pack Runner Assault
Pack Runner Assault.flavor: Working in unison, you and your wolf companion tear at an enemy from different angles, dividing the foe’s attention.
Pack Runner Assault.effect: Your beast companion makes a secondary attack against the target.
Pack Runner Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to your beast companion for the secondary attack.
Pack Runner Assault.secondaryOnHit: 1[B] + beast’s Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.

Wolfskin.name: Wolfskin
Wolfskin.flavor: As you take on a canine aspect, your senses grow keener and your footsteps fleeter.
Wolfskin.requirement: You must be within 5 squares of your beast companion.
Wolfskin.effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to Stealth and Perception checks and a +2 power bonus to speed. This effect lasts for 1 hour, until you take a minor action to end it, or until you are knocked unconscious.

Neck-Bite Pounce.name: Neck-Bite Pounce
Neck-Bite Pounce.flavor: Your wolf friend springs at your adversary, bowling the foe over and landing a vicious bite on a vital area.
Neck-Bite Pounce.onHit: 3[B] + beast’s Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Neck-Bite Pounce.onMiss: No damage, and the target is slowed and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends both).
